scheme_name: Scheme for Establishment of Backyard Poultry Units (Haryana)
description: This scheme aims to promote backyard poultry farming to provide sustainable income and employment opportunities to rural households in Haryana.
key_features: Financial assistance for setting up backyard poultry units
Focus on rural employment and income generation

category_criteria: Open to rural households in Haryana
eligibility.additional_criteria: Preference may be given to economically weaker sections

steps: Approach the local Animal Husbandry Department
Submit application form with required documents
application_process.note: Contact local authorities for detailed guidelines

special_notes: Focus on small-scale, household-level poultry farming
